title: Once Upon a Winter's Night
description: In a dramatic retelling of the classic French fairy tale "East of the Sun, West of the Moon," Camille, the beautiful young daughter of a poor crofter, is forced to wed a mysterious prince in exchange for wealth for her family, but when her husband is swept away by enchantment, she must embark on a desperate and perilous quest to save their love.
author: Dennis L. McKiernan
